attributes.action: Act now to curb the rise of racially motivated abuse & attacks
attributes.additional_details: Just some examples of the increasing evidence of racially motivated attacks and abuse caused and fuelled by divisive rhetoric and hate speach of the referendum: https://www.facebook.com/sarah.leblanc.718/media_set?set=a.10101369198638985&type=3
attributes.background: We call upon our elected representatives to act swiftly and decisively to protect this country from the alarming rise in incidents of race related abuse and attacks in the wake of the divisive referendum campaign. Hold those responsible for inciting or participating in acts of hate to strict account

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to prevent the rise of racist attacks.
